requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8265U \ AMD Ryzen 5 3500U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 \ AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10 (or later)
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 7770 (1024 MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.2 GHz
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: in some cases sometimes require a graphics card that exceeds the minimum requirement.

Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100U @ 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
